name: 6.25 "Back Seat Becky, Up Front" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Evan & Evan Drake.

	Rebecca was excited because Evan's mouth would be close to where her mouth goes all the time on the phone. The rest of the gang pretty much thought Rebecca was pathetic.

questions.text: Was Evan divorced in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	He mentioned being divorced to Rebecca. This was why Rebecca felt like it was a good time to tell Evan how she felt.

Rebecca.

	Rebecca fainted when Evan told her he was moving. She was expecting him to declare his love for her, not say he was moving across the planet.

Tokyo, Japan.

	Evan Drake was going because he had the chance to be part of the cooperation that had branched out to other areas. He was very excited about it and was leaving that night.

questions.text: What did Carla tell Rebecca to lose?
questions.explanation:
her mustache.

	She gave Rebecca a razor when she told her this. She said that she learned from experience that "there was one thing you had to do before you told a man you loved him".

cheap.

	Evan ordered a drink but did not currently have cash on him to give Woody a tip. Later when Evan gave Woody season tickets to a sporting event, Woody said "Ignore that cheap crack". Evan never heard it to begin with.

questions.text: Where did Sam say Evan's topcoat was?
questions.explanation:
in the topcoat closet.

	He did this to trick the limo driver into going into the closet. Once he was in there, Sam locked him in.

questions.text: What was the name of Evan's limo driver?
questions.explanation:
Martin.

	Martin was played by Ron Barker. He was born in 1940 in Sussex, England.

questions.text: Did Rebecca ever get to tell Evan that she loved him?
questions.explanation:
no.

	She started to tell him in the limo but the glass was up so he couldn't hear her. Then when she tried again his girlfriend called. When he told Rebecca he had a girlfriend and she was going to Japan with him, she ended up getting into an accident with the limo.

questions.correct: a cup of coffee and some olives
options: a potato and some sour cream
a carrot and some ice cream
questions.explanation:
a cup of coffee and some olives.

	Rebecca hadn't had a chance to go shopping so her house was pretty void of refreshments. Sam turned both things down and just wanted to be there as Rebecca's friend to comfort her. However, his hormones prevented that so he ended up calling her from the pay phone in the lobby.
